title: Understanding the Fill Handle
text: The fill handle is a small square at the bottom-right corner of a selected cell or range of cells in Excel. It allows you to quickly fill adjacent cells with a series of values.

title: Using the Fill Handle for Percentages
text: To create a percentage series, you need to start with a cell that contains a percentage value. Then, use the fill handle to extend this value into a series.

hintAnswer: select the range, drag the fill handle to the range you want to fill, then release the mouse button to generate the percentage series
title: Steps to Create a Percentage Series
text: $$1$$. Select the cell with the initial percentage value.\n$$2$$. Drag the fill handle across the cells you want to fill.\n$$3$$. Release the mouse button to generate the series.
choices: select the range, drag the fill handle to the range you want to fill, then release the mouse button to generate the percentage series
write the first value and it will generate
select the range, drag the fill handle to the range you want to fill, then click "generate new percentage series"
